parameters.name: BlockIp
parameters.description: The IP address that is blocked.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page. We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server to query.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the defense rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: invalid
*   **1**: enabled
*   **2**: failed
